content: this free pattern for a mini octopus includes instructions for three different styles of tentacles the pattern works well with worsted weight yarn and a 3 0 mm or 3 5 mm hook however you can use smaller or heavier weight yarn and an appropriate sized hook for the yarn size the pattern includes a size chart with recommendations for yarn size and tentacles based on hook size note the octopuses in the pattern were made using big twist value yarn which sadly won t be available much longer once joanns is closed and 3 0 mm 3 5 mm hooks
